scene.title: 一撃に返す•弐

mono.p: The sword was five feet and nine inches long, and the ancient sword Xuanyuan was transformed by Blade Sanction,
This is Ma Feima’s exclusive sword, with none like it in the world.
Taixuan’s Wrath Form’s fourth style, with two of the left hand’s fingers held back, as the Guard Form, it’s called [Gentle Orchid];
The right hand holds the blade on par with the shoulder. The blade strikes with an inch of strength, yet its power can crush mountains and shatter the ground.

text.p: However, this move has a weakness. [\s]
Even with Ma Feima's superb cultivation foundation, there’s a brief windup time between forming the stance and launching the strike.

scene.text: Ordinary martial arts masters couldn't find, and capture this momentary flaw.

text.p: However, as a cultivator of Taixuan’s Blade Mantra, Li Sushang had a chance to catch that gap. [\s]
...But Ma Feima won’t back out of his words, nor hide that weakness.
......Neither will it be transformed into Switch Form, [\s]
nor will it become Guard Form.

scene.text: With a single word- reply with one move to Wrath Form • Rockslide, only one move of Wrath Form • Rockslide!

text.p: Life and death, victory or defeat, he no longer cares, Ma Feima only lives in this moment. In his mind, that one technique Wrath Form • Rockslide.

scene.text: everything comes down to this one strike.
